title: Grant Funding Application | SCAT Data Process

fields.name: name
fields.label: Name of the organisation (LDA)

fields.name: address
fields.label: Physical address of the organisation (Name of street, section and place)

fields.name: status
fields.label: Registration status (NPO or PBO number and date of registration)

fields.name: list
fields.label: List the names, surnames, and positions of the LDA Management Committee members (Board members)

fields.name: list2
fields.label: List the names and surnames of LDA staff (EG, coordinator, administrator, field worker, etc)

fields.name: vision
fields.label: Vision

fields.name: mission
fields.label: Mission

fields.name: objectives
fields.label: Main objectives (What the organisation is aiming to achieve through its programmes and activities)

fields.name: programatic
fields.label: Main programmatic areas (The organisation’s programs and projects carried out to achieve its objective)

fields.name: access_to_justice
fields.label: Access to Justice

fields.name: gender_equity
fields.label: Gender equity (including women empowerment)

fields.name: youth_empowerement
fields.label: Youth empowerment

fields.name: food_security
fields.label: Food security, nutrition, and Local Economic Development

fields.name: climate_change
fields.label: Climate Change

fields.name: work_with
fields.label: Who do you work with within and outside your community? (E.g. CBO partners, key stakeholders, traditional leadership, etc.).

fields.name: connected_national_advocacy
fields.label: Are you connected to any national advocacy strategies or campaigns? If yes, please provide details

fields.name: fundraising_strategies
fields.label: What are the local and other fundraising strategies the LDA is implementing to raise funding?

fields.name: ensure_org_not_reliant
fields.label: What are you doing to ensure that your organisation is not reliant on SCAT only for funding?

fields.name: process_monitor_progress
fields.label: What processes do you use in your organisation to monitor your progress and learn from your experiences? (EG, planning, reviewing of organisational plans, etc.)

fields.name: progress_9_month
fields.label: Progress made on your plans for the nine (9) month period.

fields.name: challenges_faced
fields.label: Challenges faced in the community and lessons learned.

fields.name: total_income
fields.label: What is the organisation’s total income budget for 2025?

fields.name: total_expenditure
fields.label: What is the organisation’s total expenditure budget for 2025?

fields.name: income_9_months
fields.label: What is the organisation’s income for the last nine (9) months? (January to September 2025)

fields.name: expenditure_9_months
fields.label: What is the organisation’s expenditure for the last nine (9) months? (January to September 2025)
